roleset.name: control in a detailed, meddlesome manner
roleset.note: MICROMANAGE-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire. Comparison to manage.01. (from micromanage.01-v)

example.name: All args
example.text: And if Congress is going to assume authority PRO to micromanage foreign policy , it 's going to have to take some of the responsibility too .
